column3: Extracted from 6902abc804f3a96292050c63b9cad25ff628bef7 in #21843 which augments rather than replaces `ConsumeEnum()`, commit to be dropped there if merged here.

Concept ACK

Historically we've kept `FuzzedDataProvider.h` in sync with upstream ([LLVM's `FuzzedDataProvider.h`](https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/blob/main/compiler-rt/include/fuzzer/FuzzedDataProvider.h)) without any local modifications.

If we cannot upstream those changes then perhaps a helper can be added to the local `src/test/fuzz/util.h`? :)
@practicalswift That makes sense, thanks for the perspective. I'll look at doing that.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
